name: Capital Ring (Section 15, alternate route avoiding locks)

ai.summary: A short, easy 1.2 km section of the Capital Ring with an alternate route designed to avoid canal locks. Ideal for a quick urban stroll with flat paths, a mix of parkland and riverside scenery, and minimal elevation change.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, mostly paved paths along urban waterways and parkland. Some sections on gravel towpaths or compact earth; occasional street crossings where the route intersects roads.
ai.safety_notes: Follow local signs for the alternate route to avoid locks. Share the path with cyclists on towpaths; stay alert near the water's edge. Bring a light layer and water, and check weather and daylight hours for winter visits.
recommended_gear: Map or offline GPS (or smartphone with map)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; can be enjoyed year-round with appropriate clothing.

seo.meta_description: Discover an easy 1.2 km section of the Capital Ring in the UK, featuring an alternate route that avoids canal locks. Perfect for a quick urban stroll.
